description: Check validity and pretty-print graphs in canonical format. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://www.graphviz.org/pdf/nop.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Pretty-print one or more graphs in canonical format:
Check one or more graphs for validity, producing no output graph:
